name: Toxic Deluge (Commander Collection: Black)

name: Phyrexian Arena (Commander Collection: Black)
description: {1}{B}{B} • Enchantment • At the beginning of your upkeep, you draw a card and you lose 1 life. • Commander Collection: Black (CC2) #4 • Illustrated by Vincent Proce • Magic: The Gathering, MTG

name: Snake // Zombie (Commander Collection: Black)
description: Token Creature — Snake // Token Creature — Zombie • 1/1 • Deathtouch • Commander Collection: Black (CC2) #9 • Illustrated by Caroline Gariba & Xavier Ribeiro • Magic: The Gathering, MTG

name: Liliana, Heretical Healer // Liliana, Defiant Necromancer (Commander Collection: Black)
description: {1}{B}{B} • Legendary Creature — Human Cleric // Legendary Planeswalker — Liliana • 2/3 • Lifelink Whenever another nontoken creature you control dies, exile Liliana, Heretical Healer, then return her to the battlefield transformed under her owner's control. If you do, create a 2/2 black Zombie creature token. • Commander Collection: Black (CC2) #1 • Illustrated by Bastien L. Deharme • Magic: The Gathering, MTG

name: Ophiomancer (Commander Collection: Black)
description: {2}{B} • Creature — Human Shaman • 2/2 • At the beginning of each upkeep, if you control no Snakes, create a 1/1 black Snake creature token with deathtouch. • Commander Collection: Black (CC2) #3 • Illustrated by Caroline Gariba • Magic: The Gathering, MTG

name: Reanimate (Commander Collection: Black)
description: {B} • Sorcery • Put target creature card from a graveyard onto the battlefield under your control. You lose life equal to its mana value. • Commander Collection: Black (CC2) #5 • Illustrated by Nils Hamm • Magic: The Gathering, MTG

name: Ghoulcaller Gisa (Commander Collection: Black)
